name: Ball Fall Color Switch
description:
Ball Fall is a color switch ball casual game. Switch Color of the ball, and create your highest score in this ball games. It's quick casual game with color switch concept. Just make the ball fall to the deepest limit in this endless mode by switching color of the Ball fall.
Try out various balls, will definitely provide you a different experience in the ball fall game, so don't miss to check them out. Buy power-ups and use them to collect more coins while falling with color switch. And be ready for more surprises in the Ball Fall Color Switch Ball games.
How to Play:
▪️ Tap & Hold the Screen to Switch Ball's Color
▪️ Cross the Tiles & obstacles in this Ball Games
▪️ Be fast and enjoy the ball fall
This game have:
▪️ 8 different balls (skins) to switch color
▪️ 10 different hurdles to fall from
▪️ 2 Power ups as an add-on to the Ball Games
and many more with upcoming updates in the Ball Fall Color Switch Ball games.
